user_input: Please create hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. Use Methane as the complement not the carrier. No need to access any PLEXOS database for now.
author: Terajoule Assistant
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

function_args.user_input: Generate hourly Hybrid Heat Pump (HHP) demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 for scenarios ['NT','NT_HE','NT_LE'] and years [2030, 2035, 2040, 2050]. Requirements: split nodes; use Methane as the complement (not the carrier); do not access any PLEXOS database; produce machine-readable outputs suitable for subsequent TST workbook export. Ensure clear per-scenario and per-year file organization and consistent naming.

tasks.description: Generate hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 for scenarios NT, NT_HE, and NT_LE across years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050, with nodes split and Methane used as the complement (not the carrier).
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', derive processing parameters: scenarios=['NT','NT_HE','NT_LE'], years=[2030,2035,2040,2050], split_nodes=True, complement='Methane', carrier='Electricity', tyndp_year=2026. No PLEXOS DB access.

tasks.description: Convert the generated Hybrid Heat Pump hourly demand profiles to TST format for the TYNDP study team.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Use outputs from 'main_demand_processer_v2' for scenarios ['NT','NT_HE','NT_LE'] and years [2030,2035,2040,2050], with split nodes and Methane as complement. Produce TST workbooks in the standard TYNDP 2026 format. No PLEXOS DB access.
